controller

Class GameController

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.GameController

  • public class GameController
extends java.lang.Object
    This controller handles Game.fxml controls and implements game driver.
    Author:
    Yogesh

    • Method Detail

      • startGame

        public void startGame(java.util.HashSet<Continent> continentsSet,
                      java.util.HashSet<Territory> territoriesSet)
        This method forms the game map on UI, distributes territories randomly to the players, select the player randomly to start the startup phase of the game.
        Parameters:
        continentsSet: - Set of all the continents in game.
        territoriesSet: - Set of all the territories in game.

      • addReinforcement

        public void addReinforcement(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
        This method handle GameController#addArmies button event. It adds number of armies entered by player to the territory of that player.
        Parameters:
        event: - ActionEvent instance which is generated by user.

      • attack

        public void attack(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
        This method handles GameController#attackButton button event. It perform attack from selected territory to another territory selected by user.
        Parameters:
        event: - ActionEvent instance which is generated by user.

      • updateDefenderTerritories

        public void updateDefenderTerritories(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
        This method handles attackAttackerCB comboBox value change event to update attackDefenderCB comboBox values.
        Parameters:
        event: - ActionEvent instance which is generated by user.

      • finishAttack

        public void finishAttack(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
        This method handles GameController#attackFinishButton button event. It finish current player's attack phase and setup fortification UI for current player.
        Parameters:
        event: - ActionEvent instance which is generated by user.

      • doFortification

        public void doFortification(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
        This method handles GameController#fortifyMoveButton button event. It moves armies from one territory to another based on how many armies user want to move.
        Parameters:
        event: - ActionEvent instance which is generated by user.

      • updateFortifiableTerritories

        public void updateFortifiableTerritories(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
        This method handles fortifyFromTerritoryCB comboBox value change event to update fortifyToTerritoryCB comboBox values.
        Parameters:
        event: - ActionEvent instance which is generated by user.

      • finishFortification

        public void finishFortification(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
        This method handles GameController#fortifyFinishButton button event. It finish current player's fortification phase and setup reinforcement phase UI for next player turn.
        Parameters:
        event: - ActionEvent instance which is generated by user.

      • setArmiesOnPlayerOwnedCardTerritory

        public void setArmiesOnPlayerOwnedCardTerritory()
        This method is used to set armies on the territory owned by the player and the card exchanged by the player was of this territory

      • setUpCardExchangeView

        private void setUpCardExchangeView(java.util.List<java.lang.String> errorList)
        This method is used to set the card exchange view pop up.

      • startUpPhase

        private void startUpPhase()
        This method begins the startUp phase.

      • reinforcementPhase

        private void reinforcementPhase()
        This method begins the reinforcement phase.

      • displayMap

        private void displayMap()
        This method display map in grid form on UI.

      • getPlayersCount

        private int getPlayersCount()
        This method is responsible to get number of player playing this game from user.
        Returns:
        int: number of players entered by user.

      • displayPlayerInfo

        private void displayPlayerInfo()
        This method populate the current player information on UI.

      • highlightNeighbours

        private void highlightNeighbours(Territory territoryObj,
                                 boolean isEntered)
        This function is being used to help in highlighting the Neighboring territories depending on the number of clicks on the TextBox. If the TextBox is clicked twice it highlight the neighboring territories' border by red and convert it back to the original color if clicked otherwise
        Parameters:
        territoryObj: - This is the the territory on which mouse entered or exited..
        isEntered: - true if mouse is entered else false.

      • updateMapData

        private void updateMapData()
        This method update the army values in each territory for whole map.

      • updateTerritoryFields

        private void updateTerritoryFields(Territory terrObj)
        This method update the army values for selected territory.
        Parameters:
        terrObj: - territory object for which values needs to be updated on UI.

      • disableComponents

        private void disableComponents(javafx.scene.layout.Pane pane)
        This method will disable all the components on the provided pane.
        Parameters:
        pane: - pane on which components needs to be disabled.

      • enableComponents

        private void enableComponents(javafx.scene.layout.Pane pane)
        This method will enable all the components on the provided pane.
        Parameters:
        pane: - pane on which components needs to be enabled.

      • showError

        private void showError(java.lang.String error)
        This method is used to show am alert to user informing about various validation errors.
        Parameters:
        error: - Error to show to user.

      • showInformation

        private void showInformation(java.lang.String state)
        This method is used to show information to user about various events.
        Parameters:
        state: - state to show to user.

      • getNumberOfArmiesToMove

        private int getNumberOfArmiesToMove(int minArmy,
                                    int maxArmy)
        This method is used to get the number of armies player want to move from attacker territory to one which he just conquered after attack.
        Parameters:
        minArmy: - minimum number of armies which attacker is allowed to move.
        maxArmy: - maximum number of armies which attacker is allowed to move.
        Returns:
        an integer as armies to move.

      • updatePhaseInfo

        private void updatePhaseInfo(java.lang.String playerName,
                             java.lang.String phase,
                             java.lang.String info)
        A centralized method which is called from all over the code to update the phase information model state.
        Parameters:
        playerName: - Player name for which this information is updated.
        phase: - Phase which is currently player.
        info: - Information in that phase to be displayed to phase information view.

      • setUpPhaseAndWorldDominationViews

        private void setUpPhaseAndWorldDominationViews(java.util.List<java.lang.String> errorList)
        This method setup the PhaseInformationView and WorldDominationView using observer pattern.
        Parameters:
        errorList: - a list which holds errors if there is some issue with this method.
